category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Context Definition
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PortalDesignContextIsInstallationAssemblyMethod.has_bomline_prop.value
preference.preference_description: Specifies the BOM line property value used to identify an installation assembly using the has_bomline_prop method. Use this preference with the PortalDesignContextIsInstallationAssemblyMethod.has_bomline_prop.name preference to identify installation assemblies by BOM line name and value. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Can be any valid property value or run-time property value on a BOM line.
